snippet.title: Jan Pienkowski's Haunted House playthrough [Part 1]
snippet.description:
Played and recorded by:
NTom64

- - -

In Haunted House, your job is to find the 5 key combination's, scattered in random rooms about the house to unlock the cellar door.

After that, your final task is to find the front door key in the cellar. No cursor cue to help you this time, you'll have to keep clicking on objects until you find it!.

There's no danger, no game overs, no save points - just...fun, I suppose.

Unfortunately, as far as I know, this CD-ROM is no longer in production and copies are extremely scarce on sites like Amazon and Ebay. Hell, there's literally NO videos of it on Youtube, or apparently the internet itself from what I can tell.

I had been looking for my original copy for over a year, when it mysteriously appeared earlier today.

So, running it in Windows 95 compatibility mode, I thought I'd fire up Camtasia and show y'all one of my favourite childhood games.

Enjoy!
